name: PARASITE (itch) (Chixel)
description:
The Story: The Doctor name Alex Yugo created a syrup called "Parasite Syrup" this syrup can transform human into monster. He secretly conducts experiments in the hospital basement and he kidnapped people to make it a test subject. he succeeded in making the syrup but unfortunately he could not control his test subject so he decided to leave the hospital and leave the monster he made. and now Maron Hugh the last survivor is trying to get out of the hospital and get the antidote before he finally becomes a monster.

Can you escape from the hospital

available on other platform soon!!
